content: However, {短暂停}I'm sorry to say that...
Future neighbors you invite may not be able to complete house construction on their own, such as the one you just invited...
If you're okay with it, I'll convince our new neighbor {新友邻} to wait patiently. Hohoho~!
After <color=#8AAB4B>Frostia</color>'s <color=#8AAB4B>Dream Home</color> is complete and the house is built, I'll immediately begin the relocation services for our new neighbor.
Hoho~! <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, welcome back. Thank you for inviting the first neighbor for our Astralink.
I've added the new neighbor {新友邻} on Murmurs and asked for their relocation wishes.
Your new neighbor can't initiate their relocation just yet.
First, I need to confirm that you and <color=#8AAB4B>Frostia</color> have successfully built your houses with Dream Home.
Actually, they've already brought up a wishlist for their new home, so moving them now would be... awkward, hoho~
